Caption: Prof. N. Klein addresses the audience
Description: According to Campastimes, Dr. Klein “spoke of the odd little things in the I.I.T. that one does not usually notice. Their speeches were highly technical and they poked fun at everything but themselves.” On the dais from left: Prof. B. Sengupto, Sardar Ujjal Singh (Governor of Madras, and chief guest), Mrs. Ujjal Singh, Prof. S. Sampath, Dr. P. C. Varghese and a gentleman (yet to be identified).
